snippet: In a new advertising and sweepstakes campaign, Lunchables will give away prizes valued at more than $1 million to children, but critics question the nutritional component.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column notes Kraft's Lunchables, in a new ad and sweepstakes campaign, will give away prizes valued at more than $1 million to children, but critics question the nutritional component.
lead_paragraph: In a new advertising and sweepstakes campaign, Lunchables will give away prizes valued at more than $1 million to children, but critics question the nutritional component.

headline.seo: Lunchables Ads Promote a Sweepstakes for Children
headline.main: A Torrent of Toys, From Lunchables
headline.print_headline: A Torrent of Toys, From Lunchables
